"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552dbbb763687233365a0400#post_552dbbb763687233365a0400
A smarter plan for the south would have been for them to make every inch the north gained make them pay for it in blood.  If you make a superior army pay for every inch in blood eventually they'll either A)run out of soldiers or B)run out of public support for the war.

topics.body:
Good morning!
Also, I was checking my WhatsApp and then I noticed.

My friends created multiple groups and all of them consists of the same members.

[spoiler]*WHY THE FUCK WOULD YOU MAKE MULTIPLE GROUPS IF EVERYONE IN IT IS THE SAME SERIOUSLY WHAT THE FUCK ARE YOU STUPID ENOUGH TO POST ONE GROUP AND THINK THAT NO ONE WILL SEE IT SO JUST MAKE ANOTHER GROUP CONSISTING OF THE SAME MEMBERS AND HOPE THEY SEE IN THIS GROUP THE HELL IS WRONG WITH YOU AND HOW IS IT THAT YOU CAN POST IN ALL OF THEM AT THE SAME TIME THEY'RE THE SAME GODDAMN PEOPLE*[/spoiler]

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552dbde56368727015e20000#post_552dbde56368727015e20000

Counterproductive. The North could've replaced men faster due to the slaves they liberated. Offering them a chance to fight for their freedom or go back to being slaves? Impossible to resist on the long run.

Also if worst came to worst, they could just say fuck it, and let Europe loose on them in full, they were already screwed because Europe wouldn't help them anymore because they were officially fighting to keep slavery, and in their state England or Spain could have probably owned their asses easily,
